attributes.title: F**kface Break Show 1/8
attributes.caption: Happy New Year and happy breaking! Geoff and Emily are joined by Gus Sorola for the first F**kface Break Show of 2024. Will they ever find the bottom of Gus’ suitcase? You better believe they’re gonna try. We’ll also see pulls from the pack sack, fan mail, and a Blizzard Legacy Collection box.
attributes.description: Happy New Year and happy breaking! Geoff and Emily are joined by Gus Sorola for the first F**kface Break Show of 2024. Will they ever find the bottom of Gus’ suitcase? You better believe they’re gonna try. We’ll also see pulls from the pack sack, fan mail, and a Blizzard Legacy Collection box.

attributes.title: Andrew's Nugget Buddies: F**kface Break Show
attributes.caption: Geoff, Emily, and Eric are back together in search of more relics. Thanks to our lovely friend Andrew Panton, we have a special package of McNugget Buddies to open. He only needs Kerwin and Darla to complete his collection. If our special touch doesn’t bring them home, Andrew said he’s leaving F**kface forever. Better hope we get those nuggets.
attributes.description: Geoff, Emily, and Eric are back together in search of more relics. Thanks to our lovely friend Andrew Panton, we have a special package of McNugget Buddies to open. He only needs Kerwin and Darla to complete his collection. If our special touch doesn’t bring them home, Andrew said he’s leaving F**kface forever. Better hope we get those nuggets.
attributes.display_title: S2:E18 - Andrew's Nugget Buddies: F**kface Break Show

attributes.title: Topps McDonald's All American Chrome Basketball Hobby Box: F**kface Break Show
attributes.caption: Join Geoff, Emily, and Eric for yet another episode of the F**kface Break Show. You know the drill, we’ll grade our previous pulls and then dive into some NBA Hoops, Country Classics, 2023 National Hockey Card Day, LEGO Create the World, Panini Mosaic Football, 2023 AEW Upper Deck, Dick Tracy, Barbie, Allen & Ginter packs and a Topps McDonald's All American Chrome Basketball Hobby Box.
attributes.description: Join Geoff, Emily, and Eric for yet another episode of the F**kface Break Show. You know the drill, we’ll grade our previous pulls and then dive into some NBA Hoops, Country Classics, 2023 National Hockey Card Day, LEGO Create the World, Panini Mosaic Football, 2023 AEW Upper Deck, Dick Tracy, Barbie, Allen & Ginter packs and a Topps McDonald's All American Chrome Basketball Hobby Box.
attributes.display_title: S2:E19 - Topps McDonald's All American Chrome Basketball Hobby Box: F**kface Break Show

attributes.title: Tristar Platinum Autographed Baseball: F**kface Break Show
attributes.caption: Geoff, Emily, and Eric bring you another episode of the F**kface Break Show. Geoff shares the grades of last week's picks, Emily brings us some Disney collectibles, and we also open NFL Mosaic, Allen & Ginter, AEW, Dallas, and Topps Stadium packs. They’ll close the show with a Tristar Platinum Autographed Baseball… who will it be?
attributes.description: Geoff, Emily, and Eric bring you another episode of the F**kface Break Show. Geoff shares the grades of last week's picks, Emily brings us some Disney collectibles, and we also open NFL Mosaic, Allen & Ginter, AEW, Dallas, and Topps Stadium packs. They’ll close the show with a Tristar Platinum Autographed Baseball… who will it be?
attributes.display_title: S2:E20 - Tristar Platinum Autographed Baseball: F**kface Break Show

attributes.title: Nintendo NES Cartridge & Basketball Hobby Box: F**kface Break Show
attributes.caption: Welcome back to the F**kface Break Show! Aside from grading previous pulls, we have a lot of new items to sift through including some mail. We open Desert Storm, Topps Batman, Ninja Turtles, Elemental, Topps Chrome and Heritage Baseball, Topps Major League Soccer, Prizm NBA, Disney Cutie and Creepy Cuffs, Allen & Ginter, Upper Deck Baseball, Upper Deck Goodwin Champions, and other packs. We wrap up the episode by opening a Hit Parade Nintendo NES Cartridge and a Hit Parade Basketball Emerald Edition Series 1 Hobby Box.
attributes.description:
Welcome back to the F**kface Break Show! Aside from grading previous pulls, we have a lot of new items to sift through including some mail. We open Desert Storm, Topps Batman, Ninja Turtles, Elemental, Topps Chrome and Heritage Baseball, Topps Major League Soccer, Prizm NBA, Disney Cutie and Creepy Cuffs, Allen & Ginter, Upper Deck Baseball, Upper Deck Goodwin Champions, and other packs. We wrap up the episode by opening a Hit Parade Nintendo NES Cartridge and a Hit Parade Basketball Emerald Edition Series 1 Hobby Box. 

Shop Falcon merch starting February 16th at https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/f-kface
attributes.display_title: S2:E21 - Nintendo NES Cartridge & Basketball Hobby Box: F**kface Break Show

attributes.title: Every Topps 2024 Pack Available: F**kface Break Show
attributes.caption: This week on the F**kface Break Show we’ve got every variation of the Topps 2024 Series 1 packs to open. But before we get to that, we’ll grade last week's picks as well as some of Geoff’s personal picks, open some beyond appreciated mail, continue Emily’s search for the Marie Cutie Cuff, and see Geoff cry a few tears of joy.
attributes.description: This week on the F**kface Break Show we’ve got every variation of the Topps 2024 Series 1 packs to open. But before we get to that, we’ll grade last week's picks as well as some of Geoff’s personal picks, open some beyond appreciated mail, continue Emily’s search for the Marie Cutie Cuff, and see Geoff cry a few tears of joy.
attributes.display_title: S2:E22 - Every Topps 2024 Pack Available: F**kface Break Show

attributes.title: More Topps 2024 and Surprise Visits: F**kface Break Show
attributes.caption: This week we’ll continue opening our collection of the Topps 2024 Series 1 packs. We’ll also open some mail, including a package from our friend Burney, celebrate the Celtics, and open Care Bears, NHL, MLB, Nightmare Before Christmas, and G.I. Joe packs. Eric is really quiet this episode, but Griff and Jack sure aren’t!
